alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 5:33PM CDT until September 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Redwood County in southwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Yellow Medicine County in west central Minnesota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marshall, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Wood Lake, Echo, Belview, Vesta, Delhi, and Upper Sioux Agency State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
